    :month 8
    :year 2007)

    :li 4
    :ARG1 (v3 / and
        :op1 v2
        :op2 (v4 / deploy-01
            :ARG1 (v9 / missile
                :mod (v8 / ballistic)
                :mod (v7 / intercontinental)

                    :ARG1 (v15 / and
                        :op1 (v11 / break-up-08
                            :ARG1 (v14 / system
                                :instrument-of (v13 / defend-01
                                    :ARG2 (v12 / missile))))
                        :op2 (v16 / range-01
                            :ARG1 (v17 / more)
                            :quant 10.000)))
                :mod (v6 / speed)
                :ARG1-of (v5 / high-02))
            :ARG0 (v2 / research-01))))

# ::snt The results of today 's preliminary women 's water - polo competition are : the Hungarian team defeated the Canadian team by 13 : 7 , the French team defeated the Brazilian team by 10 : 9 , the Australian team defeated the German team by 10 : 8 , the Russian team defeated the Dutch team by 7 : 6 , the US team defeated the Kazakhstani team by 10 : 5 , and the Italian team defeated the New_Zealand team by 12 : 2 .

                :ARG0 v11)

        :ARG0 (v5 / woman
            :mod (v4 / preliminary))
        :time (v3 / today)

    :snt2 (v43 / country

        :wiki "Italy")

# ::snt There are 12 teams totally participating in the competition .
# ::id 1369
(v1 / team
    :ARG0-of (v3 / participate-01
        :degree (v2 / total)
        :manner (v4 / compete-02))
    :quant 12)

# ::snt ( End )
# ::id 1370
(v1 / end-01)
